EmailTemplate.name: Case - Send Acknowledgement Email (LT)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting {!Case.Business_Unit__c}!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for contacting Lord and Taylor. We've received your message and we'll make our best effort to respond as soon as possible. If you need immediate assistance, please call us and refer to case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We're available from 8am-12am EST, seven days a week, at 1-800-223-7440.
Sincerely, Lord and Taylor Customer Service
